attributes.title: worst app i ever got!!!!!!
attributes.review: this app is so bad wow. i wanted to see donald trump ofc!! and i open it and literally don’t see him it was glitchy and just wanted to see our lord 😭😭😭 this app needs to be taken down ASAP or i’m going to go crazy this app is so bad and does not deserve to be on the app store take it down now!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: I hate it...
attributes.review:
It made my grandma had a heart attack when she saw I downloaded the app and made my grandpa die because he was n shock of his wife having a heart attack 

My mom cursed me out and kicked me out of the house and I can’t come back in until I delete this app

I was home less for 2 days😭

attributes.title: I thought I would see trump naked again
attributes.review: So I downloaded this to see more of trump cause that’s daddy but they asked for my number I gave it to them then they kept sending me more email but none of them were nudes so I’m super angry that this happened so that’s why I gave it a one star review

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what trump was up to and maybe get informed and i was immediately attacked for being a "libtard"??? i don't know whose on there but after i scrolled past it had this video of some dead animal and i immediately proceeded to throw up and now i'm cleaning up my house, and if that wasn't bad enough the trump administration has literally ruined my life by sending all my friends and family a notification that i support trump and now they won't talk to me 😔 this app is horrible do not get it.

attributes.title: trauma 🤢
attributes.review: as soon as i had opened the app i was greeted the horrific sight of trumps sweaty hairy saggy balls, they were so grotesque that i projectile vomited on my entire family and when asked the problem i showed them the picture in which we all began vomiting on each other. due to this traumatic experience me an my entire family are now forced to seek therapy for our trauma. also when asked for medical bills to be payed  trumped attempted to deport my family even though we were all born here unlike his wife and her parents.

attributes.title: do NOT download.. it will RUIN your life 🤒 .
attributes.review: this is my second review and as you would know if u read my other i am currently dead . but i will be seeing you all tmr to go skiing 😋😝 . i j had to write another review to warn you NOT to download this app 😰 . just read my last review 😿 .  it won't end well 🤕🤕 .

attributes.title: This app is disgusting
attributes.review: When I first opened this app all I saw was a massive picture of Chito holding his penis in large meant pills in his right fist. about to take them. it was a sight to behold it immediately gave me brain damage and I showed it to my brother who is now paralyzed and we have to wheel him around in a wheelchair.

attributes.title: Start A Riot 🧚🏾‍♀️
attributes.review:
👁👄👁 was my reaction at this app. 
Looks like someone called Gen Z for some destruction. Didn’t even know there was a app, but when I installed it I was baffled, thrown, distraught at the sight of the orange hot Cheeto ompa loompa ❤️ It claims “make America great again” but wheewwwww chileeeee. Everything is what did it for me. So here we are, let’s start a riot. WORST APP EVER, SO OFFENDED, GET RID OF IT 🧚🏾‍♀️👄✨🤩👁✨👄✨👁

attributes.title: if i could give it 0 stars i would
attributes.review: this app doesn't even deserve 1 star. This is the most disgustingly hateful app I have ever seen. I am baffled at the fact that this app is still up and running. Truly a disgrace to human kind. Please do everyone a favor and get rid of this hateful platform.

attributes.title: The disrespect.
attributes.review: I opened the app and all the stuff in my house disappeared I was like where did it go? After that someone rung my doorbell I opened the door and there was a big orange Cheeto there he was like aye gimme a dollar I said no so he grabbed my ankle and threw me I busted my head and now I’m dead But I still had to write this😔
